data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Oostende with the kick-off.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Kevin Vandendriessche.
In the minute 33, Goal! Maxime D'Arpino extends Oostende's lead to 2-0.
Goal! Fashion Sakala extends Oostende's lead to 3-0.
The first half has been concluded at Versluys Arena.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Zulte with the kick-off.
Bassem Srarfi is replacing Omar Govea for the away team.
Francky Dury is making the team's second substitution at Versluys Arena with Jannes Van Hecke replacing Daniel Opare.
In the minute 52, Fashion Sakala (Oostende) has received a first yellow card.
Jelle Vossen is on a sub for William Bianda for Zulte.
Oostende make their first substitution with Andrew Hjulsager replacing Makhtar Gueye.
In the minute 69, Alexander Blessin (Oostende) is making a second substitution, with Marko Kvasina replacing Cameron McGeehan.
Olivier Deschacht is booked for the away team.
The home team replace Fashion Sakala with Francois Marquet.
